Release 1.0.11 - 2013-02-25

TypeChangesBy

Fixed 'connection already closed' issue caused by the Connection.close() method being called twice: one actively, then lazily from finalize(). Fixes 145.rafalcan

Updated to latest version of biomart-adapter.rafalcan

Release 1.0.10 - 2013-02-05

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), das-adapter, literature-adapter - which is faster retrieving citations from PDB -, mega-mapper - which fixes issue with querying by UniProt ID prefix - and junit.rafalcan

Added utility classes to process enzyme summaries. One of them - StructuresProcessor - replaces the list of PDBe identifiers coming from UniProt web services (including theoretical models) with the one coming from our mega-map (excluding them). Fixes 83.rafalcan

Release 1.0.9 - 2012-10-25

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.8 - 2012-10-17

TypeChangesBy

Removed line which killed tomcat. Fixes 110.rafalcan

Removed duplicate declaration of intenzAdapter field, which was hiding the superclass'.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of intenz-adapter - which can be configured now with a URL to retrieve IntEnzXML, namely web services -, literature-adapter - with faster searches -, reactome-adapter and mega-mapper.rafalcan

Release 1.0.7 - 2012-08-24

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest version of intenz-adapter, which provides cofactors.rafalcan

Added cofactors to the model. Fixes 34.rafalcan

Release 1.0.6 - 2012-08-21

TypeChangesBy

Pathways related to a Rhea reaction are not redundant any more. Fixes 105.rafalcan

Release 1.0.5 - 2012-08-20

TypeChangesBy

Removed System.out.println's from the code. Using a proper Logger not to clutter catalina.out.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of biomart-adapter, chebi-adapter and ep-util, which also get rid of System.out.println's.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of intenz-adapter, ep-domain, ebeye-adapter, biobabel-lucene and junit.rafalcan

Release 1.0.4 - 2012-08-15

TypeChangesBy

Fixed query to Rhea web services (retrieving reactions by UniProt accession now, instead of EC number). Fixes 104.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of rhea-adapter, biomart-adapter, uniprot-adapter, intenz-adapter, ebeye-adapter, reactome-adapter, das-adapter, chebi-adapter, literature-adapter, mega-mapper, ep-domain, rhea-domain, xchars and log4j.rafalcan

Release 1.0.3 - 2012-08-14

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.2 - 2012-08-07

TypeChangesBy

Updated to latest version of parent, rhea-adapter, intenz-adapter, ebeye-adapter, ep-domain (removed duplicate dependency declaration, btw), ep-util, rhea-domain, xchars and log4j.rafalcan

Replaced dependency on uk.ac.ebi.ep:ebeye-client with the shared equivalent module uk.ac.ebi.biobabel:ebeye:client.rafalcan

Release 1.0.1 - 2012-06-18

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0 - 2012-03-30

No changes in this release.
